overview: Aalap Mahadevia is an associate at Leucadia National in New York City. Prior to joining Leucadia, Aalap was an analyst at Farallon Capital Management, a $20B+ multi-strategy investment fund in San Francisco, where he focused on long/short equity strategies. Aalap graduated from Harvard College in 2003, where he concentrated in Government. He is also a member of the Class of 2009 at Harvard Business School.
